The LTV-3000 Pro with Dolby Vision and Smart Home Integration,is the best all-around and the most adaptable 4K 3D RGB laser projector
Lead time is 90 working days. Delivery is to the fist available dry area. Inside delivery and setup is not included.

settings.title: FREE SHIPPING
settings.dialog_context:
Shipping fee

USA excluded Alaska and Hawaii

For products like projectors, screens and accessories, it is free standard shipment and the delivery time is  3-4 business days after the order is processed.

For products like Smart cabinet and  Vanish Rollable Laser TV, the shipping fee is from $150-$500 depending on the size and the style. The delivery time is 90 days after the order is processed.

Other US states, territories, and other countries

For products like projectors, screens, and accessories, the shipping fee is as follows:

Australia: $150 for standard shipping and delivery time is 6-18 business days.

Canada: $150 for standard shipping and delivery time is 6-10 business days.

EU & UK: $100 for standard shipping and delivery time is 6-18 business days.

Hong Kong & Macao SAR: Free standard shipping and delivery time is 6-18 days.

View more >

settings.title: AWOL’S COMMITMENTS
settings.dialog_context:
Free Return within 30 days

Undamaged products may be returned for a full refund for any reason within 30 days of the delivery date. Once the returned item arrives back in Awol Vision’s warehouse 16 Technology Dr, Suite 133, Irvine, CA 92618 for inspection, the refund process will begin.

View more >

24 Month Hassle-Free Warranty

Elevation Technology Partners (AWOL Vision) warrants our products to be free from defects in workmanship and materials, under normal residential or commercial use and conditions, for a period as listed below.
Laser TV / Projectors/Screens: 1-year limited warranty & 1-year free extended warranty (total 2-year warranty)
Smart Cabinets: 5 years on the cabinet; 2 years on mechanical and electrical components
Accessories: 1-year limited warranty

60 Days Price Match Guarantee

AWOL guarantees that we will refund you the difference if you find a lower price from us within 30 days of your purchase.

Lifetime Customer Support

We are committed to providing lifelong customer service support, so if you need help, please contact us.

settings.title: Q1: How bright is a 3000 lumens projector like  4K LTV-3000 Pro ?
settings.answer: 3000 lumens brightness is powerful enough to deliver clear, vibrant images even in moderately lit rooms. For context, bedrooms typically use 1,000–2,000 lumens, while living rooms use 1,500–3,000 lumens. This 4K 3000-lumen TV projector performs best when paired with an ALR (Ambient Light Rejection) screen, making it adaptable with various lighting conditions.

settings.title: Q2: Can I connect my LTV-3000 Pro projector TV 4K with bluetooth speaker or earphone?
settings.answer:
Yes, All AWOL Vision 4K TV projectors support Bluetooth, allowing you to search and pair your projector with bluetooth device(speaker or earphone).
To begin pairing：
1. Go to Settings > Bluetooth > Management.
2. Make sure the Bluetooth device is in pairing mode.
3. Add an device.

settings.title: Q3: How close can LTV-3000 Pro 4K TV projector be to the wall?
settings.answer: The throw distance is determined primarily by the throw ratio and screen size requirement. A lower throw ratio (like 0.25:1) allows our 4K TV projector to be positioned very close to the wall for a large image, which is common in UST projectors. For an 80-inch screen, our LTV-3000 Pro projector can be placed as close as 6 inches (0.5 feet) to the wall.

settings.title: Q4: What is the optimal seating distance for a 3d movie projector?
settings.answer: The optimal seating distance for 3D movie projector is about 1 to 2 times the width of the projected 3D image. Sitting too close can cause eye strain and make 3D effects uncomfortable, while sitting too far reduces immersion. For example, for a 100-inch-wide 3D movie projection, aim to sit between 100 and 200 inches away to enjoy the ideal 3D viewing experience.

settings.title: Q5: Can LTV-3000 Pro operates as a 4K HDMI projector?
settings.answer: Yes, the AWOL Vision LTV-3000 Pro can operate as a 4K HDMI projector. It features HDMI 2.0b ports that support 4K resolution at 60Hz, allowing it to display Ultra HD content when connected to 4K-compatible devices like Blu-ray players, streaming devices, gaming consoles, and computers. This makes it ideal for high-quality home theater setups, delivering sharp, vibrant visuals in 4K through HDMI.

settings.title: Q6: How does the AWOL Vision LTV-3000 Pro 4K TV projector cope with flexible placement?
settings.answer: The LTV-3000 Pro 4K TV projector includes 8-point keystone correction, allowing for versatile placement options. This feature helps align the display image with the screen without needing to adjust the projector's physical position. To enable keystone correction, go to Settings > Light > Manual Correction.

settings.title: Q7: How do I screen-mirror devices or browse doc files or PPTs with the LTV 3000 Pro?
settings.answer: To connect your cell phone or tablet to the AWOL Vision 4K TV projector, simply select the screen sharing option in the main menu, scan the QR code displayed, and use the EShare app to start wirelessly sharing the screen of your portable device with the AWOL via your home Wi-Fi.

settings.title: Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.
